original_text: Now Jacob heard that he had defiled his daughter Dinah. But his sons were with his livestock in the field, so Jacob held his peace until they came.
korean_text: 야곱이 그 딸 디나를 그가 더럽혔다 함을 들었으나 자기의 아들들이 들에서 목축하므로 그들이 돌아오기까지 잠잠하였고

sentences.original_text: that he had defiled his daughter Dinah
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 딸 디나를 더럽혔다는 것을

sentences.original_text: But his sons were with his livestock in the field
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그의 아들들은 들에 있는 그의 가축과 함께 있었습니다
